block_comment: This block determines the source of 'data' according to the value of 'data_mode_rr_a'. This is accomplished by using a case statement operating on 'data_mode_rr_a'. Depending on its value, 'data' is assigned the value of one of the following: 'h_prbsdata', 'fixed_data_i', 'adata', 'hdata', 'ndata', 'w1data', or 'full_prbs_data'. If 'data_mode_rr_a' doesn't match any expected values, 'data' is set to zero.
